description: Visitors from some countries will only need to isolate for seven days rather than 14.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey moves to tiered isolation system
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey moves to tiered isolation system - BBC News
maintext: This means they no longer need to isolate but should keep a record of the people they've met and where they've gone, and can not visit care homes or the hospital, unless in an emergency.
